Label.fr: Parlons un peu de La Conciergerie!

Label.en: It's located here, on the Ile de la Cite
Label.fr: Elle est située ici, sur l'île de la Cité
Label.es: It's located here, on the Ile de la Cite
Label.zh: It's located here, on the Ile de la Cite

Label.en: Have you read my story about the Ile de La Cite?
Label.fr: As-tu lu mon histoire sur l'île de La Cité ?
Label.es: Have you read my story about the Ile de La Cite?
Label.zh: Have you read my story about the Ile de La Cite?

Label.en: Then you'll know that this is the traditional and historical centre of Paris!
Label.fr: Tu sais donc que c'est le centre traditionnel et historique de Paris !
Label.es: Then you'll know that this is the traditional and historical centre of Paris!
Label.zh: Then you'll know that this is the traditional and historical centre of Paris!

Label.en: Well, it's the traditional and historical centre of Paris!
Label.fr: Eh bien, c'est le centre traditionnel et historique de Paris !
Label.es: Well, it's the traditional and historical centre of Paris!
Label.zh: Well, it's the traditional and historical centre of Paris!
